name: Todo List extenion
description: A todo list extension to keep track with what you still need to do!
longDescription: The first todo list extension on Replit! Keep track with what you still need to do! (probably a lot). It uses the fs API from Replit extensions, and the replitCSS lib from @Hecker40. It creates a .todo file to store it per Repl, and it encodes it in base64 so it can fit on one line.
